GSD.description:
f2fs: use spin_lock to avoid hang

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit ec4187d45cc1c2d69fffeee5fa6aa4cb62477cfb. For more details please see the references link.
